name: Project Colossal (TheKiwiKingdom)
description:
You participate in a project, where you are put in various space bases. You wake up with instructions and you will need to make various machines and a cure to save yourself from death.

Features:
  • Various Minigames - Snake, Marble Maze, Symbol Matching, Simon Says. Most are listed in the trailer. I wanted to do many 2D and 3D Puzzles.
  • Quest System - You are given sets of tasks in order to know what to do
  • Various Levels - I made varying levels with a bit of story.
  • 3D Spatial Audio - Audio is spatialised. Meaning it comes from certain location. Best played with headphones
Credits:

The audio is made using https://freesound.org/ and BurghRecords
The models are either done myself or on Turbosquid. Most are also asset packs listed in the game.


Discord Server for any questions, or help or bug reports:  https://discord.gg/m3wmH3M
